attributes.action: Theresa May must be removed from office to facilitate a clean BREXIT.
attributes.background: Theresa May has wilfully betrayed the British People by working to frustrate the outcome of the largest democratic exercise in British history. Her 'deal' is an underhand mechanism to continue to subordinate UK interests to those of the EU. This is a public vote of no confidence in her leadership.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions which call for someone to lose their job. This includes government Ministers.

There are already petitions about the UK leaving the EU, which you might like to sign, for example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
